name: Jenny's Lemon Curd
description: Our lemon curd is handmade in Maine with only fresh free range eggs, cane sugar, butter and lemon. We never use anything fake. Jenny's Lemon Curd the lemony desert you remember as a child. All natural ingredients. No preservatives. Great on scones, muffins, pie, cake and cookie fillings. Great for tea time, coffee time and anytime. Link Text

name: Jenny's SOFRITO SALSA VERDE (Mild/Hot)
description: Jenny's Sofrito Salsa is a one of a kind flavoring that is great is all recipes. It is a secret ingredient in Puerto Rican and Latino cooking is a delicious flavoring ingredient for chefs of all cuisines. Jenny's sofrito is handmade using all fresh natural ingredients, no preservatives, no fats, no sugar and is naturally gluten-free. Link text

name: Jenny's Danger HABANERO SAUCE
description: Jenny's Danger Habanero Hot Sauce is delicious but extremely hot. Made from the hottest habaneros we can find mixed with our sofrito to give you a sauce that will give you that cozy hot feeling all over. DANGEROUS, NOT FOR THE WEAK! 8oz jar.Link Text

name: Jenny's HOT SAUCE LOVER'S GIFTPAK
description: JENNY'S GIFTPAK FOR HOT SAUCE LOVERS... 3 jars Sofrito Salsa Verde & Habanero Hot Sauce Giftpak. 1 each of Mild, Hot Sofrito Salsa Verde and our own XXXtra Hot Danger Habanero Hot Sauce...a heat level for every tongue. Handmade in Maine with fresh local ingredients, fresh vegetables, no preservatives. A must for the gourmet cook. Link Text
